params._isRead: bool specifying if access is a read
params._rwPositions: position of all read and writes
params._rwValues: value of all read and writes

returns._1: Returns an exit code and the amount of memory accesses

step(uint64[],bytes8[],bool[]).notice: Run step define by a MemoryManager instance.

userdoc.notice: State transiction function that takes the machine from state s[i] to s[i + 1]
